She heard him say 'stay on your gaurd."  Company? She went to the 
closet in her room and grabbed an energon rifle. She readied it and 
sat on her bunk.  She wondered who was out there and how her help was 
needed.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Quickstrike:
> 
> 
> 
> Quickstrike heard Dark Mouse on his comm-link and replied: "Ah got 
> somethin' fer ya t' do! Stay on yer guard! We's got company!" Right 
> afer he closed his comm down, he heard Venomous, and what he said 
was 
> in insult on him. It made his temper run wild. 
> 
> "Ya listen t' me," he barked viciously into his comm-link to 
> Venomous. "Ah know what ah'm doin'! Ah'm uh veteran, ya understand? 
> Ya let someone in here an' we're all slag, jus' 'cause of you!" His 
> crimons optics burned an angry red. "Jus' don't mess up!" He looked 
> out into the corridor.
